content: fuzzies by amy 2021 round 11 using accent color and working on wrong side work double_crochet in first st slip_stitch in next st work double_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st around to the end slip_stitch or invisible join then cut yarn and finish off 18 double_crochet 18 slip_stitch weave in any loose ends to finish all done enjoy you are welcome to gift or sell anything you make from this pattern if you do sell items made from this pattern i would love it if you could link to me as the designer of the pattern thank you instagram https //www instagram com/warm_n_fuzzies_byamy/ facebook https //www facebook com/warmnfuzziesbyamy ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/warm-n-fuzzies-by-amy page �3 of �3 © warm n fuzzies by amy 2021
